official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a rebate program to promote the purchase and installation of electric vehicle supply equipment for medium- and heavy-duty vehicles, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medium- and Heavy-Duty Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Act of 2021

summary.text:
Medium- and Heavy-Duty Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Act of 2021

This bill directs the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a rebate program that encourages the purchase and installation of electric vehicle charging equipment for medium-duty electric vehicles and heavy-duty electric vehicles.
